title: The issue with my Pixel which got an issue after repair, now no resolution yet.
content:
9 days ago, I have raised a complaint regarding the issue with my touch screen not working. The phone got picked up and I got my phone back in just 4-5 days after the repair.
But when I open my phone there was even a big issue where the screen and frame were not fixed properly.
After sending all the details, screenshots, clip.. still, there is no response from support or whosoever is responsible.
Its been more than 2 days now and I am not getting any help. Contacted support several times, dropped an email multiple times, however same standard response.

Can anyone help me with how I can escalate this? as in this Pandemic it is very difficult to work without a phone and it's been more than 9 days since I have not used my phone.
